data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
In the minute 4, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Sergey Tkachyov for Arsenal Tula gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
In the minute 12, Goal! Ilya Kukharchuk gives Khimki a 1-0 lead in Khimki.
Aleksandr Troshechkin instrumental with a fine assist.
Arsenal Tula awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 16, Ivan Sidenkov signals a throw-in for Arsenal Tula, close to Khimki's area.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Artem Sokol (Arsenal Tula) has received a yellow card from Ivan Sidenkov.
In the minute 20, Goal kick for Arsenal Tula at Arena Khimki.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Arsenal Tula push forward at Arena Khimki and Luka Djordjevic gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Khimki defence.
In the minute 23, Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In Khimki Arsenal Tula drive forward through Kirill Panchenko. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 26, Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy is on target but unsuccessful.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Ivan Sidenkov.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Ivan Sidenkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 30, Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Ivan Sidenkov.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 32, Arsenal Tula surge into the attack at Arena Khimki but Georgi Kostadinovâ€™s header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 33, Ivan Sidenkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Khimki's half.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 35, Can Arsenal Tula capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
Ivan Sidenkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Khimki's half.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 38, Arsenal Tula drives forward and Alesandr Lomovitskiy gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Arsenal Tula have a goal kick.
In the minute 39, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Evans Kangwa is replacing Luka Djordjevic for Arsenal Tula at Arena Khimki.
Nikolay Rasskazov of Arsenal Tula smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Khimki pushes forward through Denis Glushakov, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 42, Corner awarded to Khimki.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Khimki.
In the minute 44, Arsenal Tula drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Arsenal Tula have an attacking throw-in.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, At Arena Khimki the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ivan Sidenkov awards Khimki a goal kick.
The first half has been concluded at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Arena Khimki.
Can Arsenal Tula get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in their own half.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 46, Dmitri Parfenov (Arsenal Tula) is making a second substitution, with Anri Hagush replacing Artem Sokol.
Igor Cherevchenko is making the team's first substitution at Arena Khimki with Mohamed Konate replacing Aleksandr Dolgov.
In the minute 46, Denis Glushakov (Khimki) gets a yellow card.
Free kick for Arsenal Tula in the half of Khimki.
Free kick Arsenal Tula.
In the minute 48, Kirill Panchenko (Arsenal Tula) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Khimki Khimki attack through Ilya Kukharchuk. The finish is off target, however.
Ivan Sidenkov awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
In the minute 50, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Khimki close to the penalty box.
Vladimir Dyadyun is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
The match at Arena Khimki has been interrupted briefly for a check on Anri Hagush, who is down injured.
In the minute 53, Khimki are caught offside.
Anri Hagush for Arsenal Tula is back on the field again.
Vladimir Dyadyun returns to the field for Khimki after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 54, Khimki to take a throw-in in Arsenal Tula territory.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Ivan Sidenkov.
Arsenal Tula's Alesandr Lomovitskiy breaks free at Arena Khimki. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 55, Khimki have a goal kick.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Sergey Tkachyov gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Khimki defender.
In the minute 59, Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Arsenal Tula are whistled for offside.
Arsenal Tula have been awarded a corner by Ivan Sidenkov.
In the minute 60, Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Khimki in their own half.
Throw-in Arsenal Tula.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 61, Khimki push forward at Arena Khimki and Aleksandr Troshechkin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Arsenal Tula defence.
Ball safe as Arsenal Tula is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula in the half of Khimki.
The away team have replaced Goran Causic with Valeri Gromyko. This is the third substitution made today by Dmitri Parfenov.
Khimki's Mohamed Konate goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Dmitri Tikhiy for Khimki has been booked by Ivan Sidenkov and receives a first yellow card.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a Arsenal Tula throw-in in Khimki's half.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 65, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula's Kirill Panchenko gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 67, It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Arsenal Tula.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 69, Important block from the Khimki defence as Valeri Gromyko fires in a strike for Arsenal Tula.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
In the minute 71, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Kirill Bozhenov for Khimki who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Arsenal Tula to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
Kirill Bozhenov (Khimki) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Arseni Logashov.
In the minute 74, Free kick Khimki.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a free kick to Arsenal Tula in their own half.
In the minute 79, Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Arsenal Tula's half?
Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arena Khimki.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Arsenal Tula at Arena Khimki.
Arsenal Tula make their fourth substitution with Daniil Khlusevich replacing Alesandr Lomovitskiy.
Dmitri Parfenov (Arsenal Tula) is making a fifth substitution, with Yevgeni Lutsenko replacing Kirill Panchenko.
In the minute 82, Can Khimki capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Arsenal Tula's half?
Arsenal Tula's Evans Kangwa breaks free at Arena Khimki. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 84, Ivan Sidenkov awards Arsenal Tula a goal kick.
Can Khimki capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Ivan Sidenkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, Free kick for Khimki in the half of Arsenal Tula.
Arsenal Tula have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 88, Throw-in high up the field for Arsenal Tula in Khimki.
In Khimki Khimki attack through Ilya Lantratov. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Arsenal Tula goal kick.
Free kick for Khimki in their own half.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Ivan Sidenkov.
Ivan Sidenkov signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Arsenal Tula's area.
Arsenal Tula awarded a free kick in their own half.
Arsenal Tula are coming forward and Yevgeni Lutsenko gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Daniil Khlusevich gets his shot on target but fails to score for Arsenal Tula.
Corner awarded to Arsenal Tula.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Valeri Gromyko (Arsenal Tula) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Khimki's Brian Idowu has been booked in Khimki.
